title: Sulfur doped Porous Carbon Sheets Embedded with Rich Iron Sites for the 1O2 Dominated Peroxymonosulfate Activation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00971H, Paper
Yadan Song, Yalong Liu, Yangju Li, Haipeng Hu, Kexin Huang, Zhe Zhang, Zhongxian Li, Wanning Cao, Kai Jiang, Dapeng Wu
The poor anti-interference ability of radical-dominated processes continues to be a hindrance to the effectiveness of purification and practical use of Peroxymonosulfate-based advanced oxidation processes (PMS-AOPs). Here, iron, nitrogen, and...
